detail.name: The Infinite PhantomJugglus Juggler
detail.effect: [DBL][TRP] 《When this character enters play》 You may choose one card at random from an opponent's hand, to reveal it. If the revealed card is a character card, give the battle opponent of one of your 『JUGGLUS JUGGLER』 a BP grade decrease by 1 for this turn. (*The revealed card returns to its previous state.)
detail.flavor_text: This is the story about the pain of not being chosen, of a man wreathed in darkness, reaching out for the light.

detail.name: Labyrinth
detail.effect: [Activate] (Once per turn) If you have 『NEXUS』 , send the top card of your deck to your discard area → If the sent card is a scene card, give up to two of your Ultra Heroes +2000 BP for this turn. Otherwise, give one opponent's character -2000 BP for this turn. (*BP will not be less than 0.)

detail.name: Ultraman Ginga
detail.effect: [SIN][DBL] 《When this character enters play》 If you have two or more DOUBLE Ultra Heroes, you may give this character +2000 BP for this turn.
detail.flavor_text: Wipe your tears, and fight, oh champion of the galaxy!

detail.name: Ultraman Decker
detail.effect: [SIN] 《When this character enters play》 If you have a TRIPLE Ultra Hero, you may give this character +3000 BP for this turn.
detail.flavor_text: The GUTS Hawk's incredible speed turned Decker's already powerful blow into an unstoppable force!

detail.name: Ultraman Orb
detail.effect: [TRP] 《When this character enters play》 You may draw two cards, to give one of your 『ORB』 +1000 BP for this turn.
detail.flavor_text: This is the story of a chosen hero, and the endless chronicle of his efforts to light the darkness.

detail.name: Juggler Dies!
detail.effect: [Activate] (Once per turn) If you have 『JUGGLUS JUGGLER』 , choose one card at random from an opponent's hand, to reveal it → If the revealed card is a character card, give two of your characters +1000 BP for this turn. (*The revealed card returns to its previous state.)

detail.name: Ultraman Geed
detail.effect: [DBL][TRP][Activate] (Once per turn) Send the top card of your deck to your discard area → If the sent card has TYPE 【POWER】 or 【ARMED】 , give one of your Ultra Heroes TYPE 【POWER】 for this turn.
detail.flavor_text: Even a clone has the right to choose their own path.

detail.name: The Hallucination AlienAlien Metron
detail.effect: [SIN][DBL] 《When this character enters play》 You may reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If the revealed card is an Ultra Hero card, give one of your characters +1000 BP for this turn. Return the revealed card to the top or bottom of their deck.
detail.flavor_text: He invited the man to sit, a genteel contrast to the chaotic madness his plans had wrought. After all, he didn't need violence to conquer the Earth.

detail.name: Ultraman Belial
detail.effect: [DBL][TRP][Activate] (Once per turn) Discard one card from your hand that is not an Ultra Hero card → Give one of your 『BELIAL』 , or one of your Kaiju with printed EXTRA BP, a BP grade increase by 1 for this turn.
detail.flavor_text: When the brightest star collapses, all that is left is darkness and hunger.

detail.name: Ultraman Ginga
detail.effect: [SIN][DBL] While you have two or more DOUBLE Ultra Heroes, this character's BP grade increases by 1. Additionally, while you have four or more DOUBLE Ultra Heroes, give this character +1000 BP.
detail.flavor_text: He came from an unknown future to usher in a new generation of heroism.

detail.name: The Man who Created SKaRD
detail.effect: [Activate] (Once per turn) If you have 『BLAZAR』 , reveal the top five cards of your deck → Put one Ultra Hero card from among them into play on top of one of your Ultra Hero that is able to level up with it, and send the rest to your discard area. At the end of turn, send cards put into play with this effect to your discard area.

detail.name: Ultraman Belial
detail.effect: [DBL][TRP][Activate] (Once per turn) Discard one card from your hand that is not an Ultra Hero card → Give one of your 『BELIAL』 , or one of your Kaiju with printed EXTRA BP, a BP grade increase by 1 for this turn.
detail.flavor_text: He sought the power he thought he deserved, but the Plasma Spark rejected the darkness within his heart.

detail.name: Ultraman Ginga
detail.effect: [SIN][DBL] While you have two or more DOUBLE Ultra Heroes, this character's BP grade increases by 1. Additionally, while you have four or more DOUBLE Ultra Heroes, give this character +1000 BP.
detail.flavor_text: Even as the Dark Spark War stole time from countless heroes and monsters, he appeared to shine a light of hope.

detail.name: The Infinite Phantom Jugglus Juggler
detail.effect: [DBL][TRP] 《When this character enters play》 You may choose one card at random from an opponent's hand, to reveal it. If the revealed card is a character card, give the battle opponent of one of your 『JUGGLUS JUGGLER』 a BP grade decrease by 1 for this turn. (*The revealed card returns to its previous state.)
detail.flavor_text: Behind every wicked plan, every vicious insult, was a man who just wanted to be recognized.

detail.name: Ultraman Belial
detail.effect: [DBL][TRP][Activate] (Once per turn) Discard one card from your hand that is not an Ultra Hero card → Give one of your 『BELIAL』 , or one of your Kaiju with printed EXTRA BP, a BP grade increase by 1 for this turn.
detail.flavor_text: To carve out the heart of the Land of Light. Even that would not satisfy him.

detail.name: Ultraman Orb
detail.effect: [TRP] 《When this character enters play》 You may draw two cards, to give one of your 『ORB』 +1000 BP for this turn.
detail.flavor_text: To illuminate the darkness, and defeat evil. That is why he fights.

detail.name: Ultraman Nexus
detail.effect: [DBL][TRP] 《When this character enters play》 You may send one opponent's scene to its owner's discard area, or return one scene card from your discard area to the top or bottom of your deck, to give one of your Ultra Heroes +2000 BP for this turn.
detail.flavor_text: Every Deunamist has their own reason for fighting, but all connect through their bond with Nexus.

detail.name: Ultraman Ginga
detail.effect: [SIN][DBL] While you have two or more DOUBLE Ultra Heroes, this character's BP grade increases by 1. Additionally, while you have four or more DOUBLE Ultra Heroes, give this character +1000 BP.
detail.flavor_text: Ginga fights so that others may dream without limits!

detail.name: Guil Arc
detail.effect: [SIN] 《When this character enters play》 You may draw two cards. When you draw with this effect, return one card from your hand to the bottom of your deck.
detail.flavor_text: Trauma was allowed to fester in his heart until even his ideals of heroism were corrupted.
detail.participating_works: Ultraman Arc the Movie: The Clash of Light and Evil

detail.name: Dark Lugiel
detail.effect: [SIN][DBL] 《When this character enters play》 You may choose this character's battle opponent. If you do, the chosen character cannot level up during the next turn.
detail.flavor_text: "What is peace?" To find the answer, the future diverged into light and darkness.

detail.name: Gleam of Eternal Hope
detail.description:
A new hero makes his debut - Ultraman Omega!
Existing Ultra Heroes have also received powerful new upgrades!
detail.feature:
Ultraman Omega, the titular hero of the new series airing this summer, makes his appearance in UCG!
Existing Ultra Heroes such as Ultraman Dyna, Z and Trigger, will also gain new strength!
Find your Ultra Buddy from the growing selection of Heroes!

Exciting parallel rarities ExP, AP, and UR will also be available in this set! A total of two ExP types will appear in this booster pack!

Ultraman Arc returns in this booster, with brand new cards that synergize with Starter Deck 03! More Kaiju will make their appearance as well, a looming threat that our Ultra Heroes must face head-on!
detail.included_items:
・12 random cards
・1 flyer with QR code
Number of Types　Total 112 cards+31 parallel cards
detail.notes:
Important Notes:
Cards are randomly included.
The actual product may differ slightly from the images.
Product specifications may change.

detail.name: Ω to the Future
detail.description:
Ultraman Arc and Ultraman Omega join forces!
Unite the power of these two heroes and start your journey in the Ultraman Card Game!
detail.feature:
・With a Starter Deck product, you can get into the game right away!
・This product contains completely original cards not found in the Booster Pack!
　A must-have for building new decks with Booster Pack 04 “Gleam of Eternal Hope” featuring the brand new Ultra Hero.
・One pack of Booster Pack 04 will also be included!

Utilize the Discard Area skillfully and combine powers of your Ultra Heroes and achieve victory!
detail.included_items:
・50 card pre-constructed deck(20 card types)
・1 pack BP04
・1 playsheet
・1 Deck Guide
detail.notes:
In a booster pack, "Gleam of Eternal Hope," cards are randomly included.
The actual product may differ slightly from the images.
Product specifications may change.

detail.name: Shadow of Undying Vengeance
detail.description:
The highly anticipated arrival of the Dark Hero Ultraman Belial!
You are now able to build a Kaiju deck!
detail.feature:
Ultraman Belial and the Kaiju Deck have finally appeared!
You can build a deck using just the cards in this pack!
A brand new adventure with UCG awaits!

In addition to the popular ExP and AP, Parallel cards of Kaijus will also be included starting from BP03.

Geed and Zero, the archenemies of Belial, will also make their appearance with a whole new look!
The Ultra Heroes who appeared in SD02, BP01 and 02 will also be strengthened!
detail.included_items:
・12 random cards
・1 flyer with QR code
Number of Types　Total 111 cards+30 parallel cards
detail.notes:
Important Notes:
Cards are randomly included.
The actual product may differ slightly from the images.
Product specifications may change.

detail.name: Vortex of Crimson and Azure
detail.description:
Finally, the Giant of the Azure Sea, Ultraman Agul makes his appearance
Featuring Zero and Gaia in their newly Upgraded Form!
detail.feature:
Many cards that enhances BP01 decks such as Zero will be included
In addition, Ultra Heroes from the SD such as Dyna are included, to further enhance the 2 SDs

Continuing from BP01, popular AP and UR parallel cards will also be included!
Furthermore, a New Rarity ExP will make its debut
TYPE [Devastation] will be added to the lineup of Kaiju cards!
detail.included_items:
・12 random cards
・1 flyer with QR code

detail.name: Ultraman: Rising
detail.description: Featuring Ultraman, Emi and Ultradad from [Ultraman: Rising]
detail.feature:
Lineup is based off [Ultraman: Rising]
Extra Deck 01, featuring [Ultraman Rising]
The largest BP in UCG history! Use Emi's effects to support Ultraman to ensure victory!

detail.name: Guardians of the Earth
detail.description: Featuring heroes from the Heisei series, the New Generation series, and the latest addition, Ultraman Arc!
detail.feature:
Enhance your two starter decks with numerous characters found within the Booster packs!

Featuring various card designs, including stills from the show, newly shot studio photos, and original illustrations!
Includes Kaiju cards! Plus, an array of scene cards that capture the most memorable moments from the works!

detail.name: Heroes of Hyper Space
detail.description:
Tiga, Dyna, and Gaia gather at the Ultraman Card Game across time and space !
You are the one to unleash “The Battle in Hyper Space”!
detail.feature:
Card lineup based on the movie “Ultraman Tiga, Ultraman Dyna & Ultraman Gaia: The Battle in Hyper Space”!
Starter Deck 01 "Heroes of Hyper Space"

Build a solid game with basic effects and gaining advantages!

detail.name: The Bonds of Zero
detail.description:
Zero, Geed, and Z, bound by friendship and mentorship, stand together!
Fight with the bonds of these three heroes!
detail.feature:
Card lineup based on Ultraman Z Episode 6 “The Man Returns!” and Episode 7 “His Majesty's Medal”!
Starter Deck 02 "The Bonds of Zero"

Grab a victory by taking type advantage over your opponent!
